layer.name: Resources
layer.definition: The logical produce of skill; surplus in the forms of money, time, energy, knowledge, and relational capital that can be stewarded and reinvested for ongoing value. Not just having enough — having MORE than enough.

questions.text: I have emotional reserves — I can absorb difficulty without immediately destabilizing.
I have enough emotional stability to be present for others' emotions without being overwhelmed.
I'm not constantly emotionally depleted — I have energy for connection and relationship.
I've processed enough of my own baggage that I'm not triggered by everyone else's.
I have developed emotional wealth — peace, joy, contentment — that overflows to others.
